items.value:
Improved fuel to increase jetpack movement speed

<color=orange>Survive 5 waves</color>

Increase Shelter's maximum defense (strength) by 30 points through the use of a special combination of materials found on different planets

<color=orange>Survive 10 waves</color>

Chance to get two materials instead of one when refining by using more efficient method and latest equipment

<color=orange>Survive 20 waves</color>

Increases damage dealt by missile with a cumulative effect

<color=orange>Survive 28 waves</color>

Increases drill power by default

<color=orange>Survive 25 waves on Hard mode</color>

Activate any one artifact of your choice at the start of each run

<color=orange>Defeat Hamy (at wave 30) in Monsoon mode</color>
New achievement: survive <color=orange>{0}</color> days. New special upgrade available - <color=orange>{1}</color>
Increasing the strength (20) of the shelter's surface
Increases movement speed by improving jetpack performance
Upgraded drill: better than the previous one, at least it looks like that
Increases jetpack load limit for flying with more resources
To create an artifact, you need to find a part of it
Creates a device that strikes an enemy creature with an energy blast if they get close to the reach area
Restores a little strength of the dome at the expense of the material extracted after killing the monster
Creates two cores. Teleports you to the dome. Recharge within 55 seconds
Creates with a chance a yellow ore from a slain enemy
Fires several homing plasma missiles for red ore
Chance to fire a homing plasma missile each time an enemy is hit
Additional damage to the enemy if he has more than 90% health
When the shelter's durability is below 20%, double damage against enemies
When the shelter is above 93% durability, double attack speed (missile reload)
Creates a special elevator with the delivery of resources using drones
When repairing the dome, fires several homing plasma missiles made from old, replaced parts of the dome

items.key: choose which part of the artifact to convert the material into
items.value: choose which part of the artifact to convert the material into

items.key: you received part of the artifact
items.value: you received part of the artifact

items.key: With it, you can create this artifact using ordinary resources in the Artifacts tab
items.value: With it, you can create this artifact using ordinary resources in the Artifacts tab
<color=orange>Extract</color>. Get resources, take them to the refiner in the dome and use them wisely
<color=orange>Upgrade</color>. Improve your dome defenses, gun, drill and other to withstand the waves
<color=orange>Survive</color>. Every certain time a wave of monsters comes, be ready to fight back
